casebody.data:
John DOE et al.
v.
Bruce BEMER et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 17, 2018

Wesley W. Horton, Brendon P. Levesque, Anthony Spinella and John Sullivan, in support of the petition.

Kevin C. Ferry and Monique S. Foley, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court's motion (AC 182040) is dismissed.
